title: Omuro
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal

L margi LLC: [ ??? ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in pencil: [Omuro]; L
description: large orange and white shrine building occupies most of the scene at L; people depicted on and around the stairway; two women at LL approach the grounds while two women, one with orange umbrella near LR approach the stairs; white wall and silhouettes of trees in background at R
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
